mapper.update:
update staff
staff_name = #{staffName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
staff_password = #{staffPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
staff_email = #{staffEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
staff_sfz = #{staffSfz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
staff_tel = #{staffTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
staff_sex = #{staffSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
staff_entrytime = #{staffEntrytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
staff_price = #{staffPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER},
staff_success = #{staffSuccess,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
staff_bonus = #{staffBonus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
staff_departure_time = #{staffDepartureTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
staff_status = #{staffStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where staff_id = #{staffId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update staff set staff_name = #{staffName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, staff_password = #{staffPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, staff_email = #{staffEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, staff_sfz = #{staffSfz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, staff_tel = #{staffTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, staff_sex = #{staffSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, staff_entrytime = #{staffEntrytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, staff_price = #{staffPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, staff_success = #{staffSuccess,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, staff_bonus = #{staffBonus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, staff_departure_time = #{staffDepartureTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, staff_status = #{staffStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER} where staff_id = #{staffId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from staff where 1=1
and staff_id like concat(concat('%',#{staffId}),'%')
and staff_name like concat(concat('%',#{staffName}),'%')
and staff_password like concat(concat('%',#{staffPassword}),'%')
and staff_email like concat(concat('%',#{staffEmail}),'%')
and staff_sfz like concat(concat('%',#{staffSfz}),'%')
and staff_tel like concat(concat('%',#{staffTel}),'%')
and staff_sex like concat(concat('%',#{staffSex}),'%')
and staff_entrytime like concat(concat('%',#{staffEntrytime,jdbcType=INTEGER}),'%')
and staff_price like concat(concat('%',#{staffPrice}),'%')
and staff_success like concat(concat('%',#{staffSuccess}),'%')
and staff_bonus like concat(concat('%',#{staffBonus}),'%')
and staff_departure_time like concat(concat('%',#{staffDepartureTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}),'%')
and staff_status like concat(concat('%',#{staffStatus}),'%')
